posts.post_title: T206 Broad Leaf, Lenox, Carolina Brights
posts.post_content:
Emails take priority over posts or PM's (ppgustafson@yahoo.com).  Prices are for check/money order and include shipping & insurance.  Paypal is acceptable as long as I incur no fees (or you add 3% to the payment).
